review: this thing is fantastic.  way to go amazon.  i have a chromecast too and this is much more user friendly.  easy set up.  comes registered to your account right out of the box.  the remote is a nice feature.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Works as expected; wonderful asset for our entertainment selections. Even with 173 channels, sometimes there's "nothing" on TV. The Fire TV Stick solves that problem. Highly recommended.
author: Thomas R. Fletcher "Prose & Photos"

review: Works just as advertised with Amazon Prime and Netflix.
author: Linda H

review: I'm only slightly above average when it comes to technology, so I was pleased with how intuitive the set-up was. We've used it twice so far. Works well--gives us access to a broad array of entertainment choices.
author: John J. Contreni

In order to get information from Amazon (they have a record of my myriad caslls) it was like piulling teeth. Their overseas operators have no idea how to solve a problem where you do not have the latest Kindle Fire. You end up with a :sorry it's not possible". In order to do anything I had to research the problem on the internet, grind my teeth and finally solvre it. What a difference with the Barnes and Noble Nook. No such problems. Also as I read the Chromecast which I am installing in my West Coast home, it should be much easier. In any event- It seems to me that Amazon's obsession with its propriery  system prevents it from either putting out a really useful product- or servicing it. over the phone Android will always be Abdroid and Amazon doesn't come close. review: we turned off our dirtectv 6 months ago and used our laptop hooked up to the tv to watch amazon prime and Netflix movies and shows. the fire tv stick is amazing, making watching tv so much easier! Love it!!
author: betsy rodgers

review: Fire stick is easy to install and easy to use.  Has a great variety of movies, games and TV shows. If your schedule allows time to watch enough movies, the price is good.  Sometimes reception isn't as good as other times and the movie has to keep loading.  Overall it is a good product.
author: lois hughes

review: This thing is awesome!! Easy to install and set-up. Remote works perfectly even though the unit is behind the TV. Can use more apps which I'm sure will come in time. WELL worth the cost.
author: Robert

review: Better than expected.  Easy to set up with excellent load times and minimal interruptions while streaming.  Works seamlessly with our mobile devices as well.  Access to a large amount of free content with good premium options as well.
author: Brandon Litzner
